resources.string: "Create as many 4+ letter words as you can using the letters displayed. Each word must contain the center letter."

From a 6x6 grid of letters, the challenge is to form as many high scoring words as possible. Words may only be formed from sequences of adjacent tiles. Two tiles are adjacent if their edges or corners meet.A tile can only be used once.
Basically, stop the bugs from getting through. Congratulations, You are now a debugger.
Nothing is for free. Use your points to perform this action.
Well this is embarrassing. You\'re too broke for this.
